settings.headline: This is a Medium Tile
settings.copy:
Use this tile for average pieces of page content.

It's great if you want to put a small tile of something next to it on desktop.

settings.headline: This is a Small Tile
settings.copy:
Use this tile for minor pieces of page content.

Perfect for asides like Highlight Lists.
